description.p: Lunarians are an extraordinarily rare people believed to be descendants of the Moon itself—or shaped so completely by lunar influence that the distinction no longer matters. Deeply attuned to magic and the night sky, Lunarians perceive arcane forces instinctively, reacting to spells and supernatural phenomena in ways that often defy mortal logic.

To most folk, the Moon is distant and mute. To Lunarians, it is intimate: a presence that watches, measures, and answers. Their emotions tend to run bright beneath moonlight, and their sense of time is subtly misaligned with the mortal world—days are easy to count, but decades feel like seasons.

p.em: “Every lunarian is born with an obsession. Some chart stars. Some count footsteps. Some refuse to let a single thought end where it began.”

description.p: Lunarians are not a people you “find” so much as you notice. A village may go a lifetime with none, then remember one forever: the child whose eyes reflected a pale ring even in darkness; the traveler who always knew when a spell was forming; the friend who spoke of the night sky like it was a map of personal history.

Some tales insist Lunarians are born when moonlight strikes a newborn’s skin for the first time. Others claim they are shaped by prolonged exposure to lunar power—sleeping too many nights beneath a silvered sky, surviving a ritual gone wrong, or carrying a family curse that is not quite a curse. However it happens, the result is the same: the Moon leaves a signature on the soul.
Two forms of Lunarians exist: Pure Lunarians, whose bodies fully reflect their lunar heritage, and Lunar-Touched, members of other ancestries altered by the Moon’s influence.

Pure Lunarians often exhibit rabbit-like ears and a small, rounded scut. Their features may appear soft or pale, and their irises can seem dusted with glitter or starlight when interacting with magic. They mature at a human rate but commonly live between 800 and 1,000 years.

Lunar-Touched resemble their origin ancestry—human, elf, dwarf, tiefling, and so on—with only subtle lunar reactions and an extended lifespan marking them as lunar. Many Lunar-Touched live roughly twice as long as members of their origin ancestry, and some report that their emotions feel “louder” beneath open night sky.
All Lunarians—Pure and Lunar-Touched alike—exhibit lunar reactions. These are not always constant, but they are unmistakable when they appear. The Moon does not merely shine on them; it answers.
When using Lunar Glow, casting spells, or standing beneath true moonlight, subtle signs may surface:

ul.li: Arcane markings along the skin becoming visible

description.p: Among Lunarians, these signs are treated as normal as breathing. Among others, they are often mistaken for omens.

Pure Lunarians invariably develop an obsession—an idea, object, practice, belief, or fixation that shapes their behavior for years or centuries. This is widely understood as a natural consequence of lunar influence rather than madness. The Moon narrows the mind the way a lens narrows light: not to reduce it, but to concentrate it until it burns.
If you want to choose randomly, roll a d12 on the table below.
Lunar-Touched Lunarians often retain the psychology of their origin ancestry, but many report heightened intuition, restlessness, or emotional intensity under the night sky.

Most Lunarians take names from the cultures that raise them. However, Pure Lunarians in particular often adopt “moon-names”—titles drawn from the names of moons and celestial bodies—as a quiet nod to their origin. These names are not claims of divinity; they are reminders. To a Lunarian, a moon-name is a promise to remain in motion, to keep returning, and to never be entirely understood at first glance.
Your Lunarian character has the following racial traits.

Ability Score Increase. Your ability score increases are determined by your Lunarian Origin.
Size. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your walking speed is 35 feet.
Age. Lunarians mature at a rate similar to humans, but age far more slowly.
Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.
Arcane Training. You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill. In addition, you gain proficiency in either Perception or Performance (your choice).
Lunar Perception. You have blindsight out to a range of 20 feet.
Lunar Glow. Once per short rest, as a bonus action, you emit moonlight in a 5-foot radius of bright light, with dim light for an additional 10 feet. This light lasts for 10 minutes or until you dismiss it (no action required).
Arcane Sensitivity. Once per long rest, when you are required to make a saving throw against a spell, you can choose to gain advantage on that saving throw. You can use this trait even if you cannot see the source of the spell. You must choose to use this trait before rolling.
Lunar Reactions. When using Lunar Glow, casting spells, or standing beneath moonlight, subtle signs may appear: hair emitting a faint glow; arcane markings along the skin becoming visible; eyes reflecting pale lunar light.
Lunarian Origin. Choose Pure Lunarian or Lunar-Touched. Your origin determines your ability score increases and grants additional traits.

setters.set: Ganymede, Titan, Iapetus, Hyperion, Janus, Oberon, Triton, Proteus, Enceladus, Mimas, Prometheus, Epimetheus, Deimos, Phobos
Io, Europa, Callisto, Amalthea, Thebe, Metis, Adrastea, Himalia, Elara, Pasiphae, Sinope, Lysithea, Carme, Ananke, Leda, Rhea, Dione, Tethys, Phoebe, Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel, Titania
Moonwake, Silvervein, Nightglass, Starweft, Palecrest, Luneshard, Dawnglint, Eclipseborne, Gloamharbor, Astralwyn, Skysigil, Voidpetal

description.p: You have blindsight out to a range of 20 feet.
You gain proficiency in the Arcana skill. In addition, you gain proficiency in either Perception or Performance (your choice).

sheet.description: Proficiency: Arcana. Also gain proficiency in either Perception or Performance.

description.p: You possess heightened awareness shaped by lunar and arcane influence.
You have blindsight out to a range of 20 feet. Within this range, you perceive creatures and objects through subtle shifts in magic, light, and presence rather than sight alone.
Once per short rest, as a bonus action, you emit moonlight in a 5-foot radius of bright light, with dim light for an additional 10 feet.
This light lasts for 10 minutes or until you dismiss it (no action required).
This glow may cause your hair, eyes, or lunar markings to visibly shimmer.

sheet.description: Emit moonlight for 10 minutes: 5 ft bright light, +10 ft dim light. Dismiss it (no action).

description.p: Once per long rest, when you are required to make a saving throw against a spell, you can choose to gain advantage on that saving throw. You can use this trait even if you cannot see the source of the spell.
You must choose to use this trait before rolling.

sheet.description: When you make a saving throw against a spell, you can gain advantage (choose before rolling).

description.p: When using Lunar Glow, casting spells, or standing beneath moonlight, subtle signs may appear: hair emitting a faint glow, arcane markings becoming visible, eyes reflecting pale lunar light.

sheet.description: Cosmetic: hair/eyes/markings may shimmer under moonlight or when using magic.

description.p: Choose one of the following origins at character creation: Pure Lunarian or Lunar-Touched.

sheet.description: Choose your origin: Pure Lunarian or Lunar-Touched.

description.p: Pure Lunarians are fully shaped by lunar influence, both physically and spiritually.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one of your Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma scores by 2, and increase your Dexterity score by 1.
Lunar Melody. When you spend Hit Dice to regain hit points during a short rest, you regain the maximum number of hit points possible for each Hit Die spent.
Trance of the Moon. In addition, you require only 6 hours to complete a long rest.

sheet.description: ASI: +2 (Wis/Int/Cha), +1 Dex. Maximize Hit Dice healing on short rests. Long rests require only 6 hours.

description.p: Increase one of your Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma scores by 2.

sheet.description: Increase one of Wisdom, Intelligence, or Charisma by 2.

description.p: Your Wisdom score increases by 2.
Your Intelligence score increases by 2.
Your Charisma score increases by 2.
When you spend Hit Dice to regain hit points during a short rest, you regain the maximum number of hit points possible for each Hit Die spent.
In addition, you require only 6 hours to complete a long rest.

sheet.description: Maximize Hit Dice healing during short rests. You need only 6 hours for a long rest.

description.p: Lunar-Touched Lunarians are members of other ancestries marked by prolonged exposure to lunar power.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 2, and increase a different ability score of your choice by 1.
Ecliptic Surge. Once per short rest, after you roll a d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw and determine the result, you can choose to add your proficiency bonus to the roll. This bonus is added in addition to any proficiency bonus already applied. You can use this trait after seeing the roll, but before the outcome is resolved.
Origin Ancestry. Choose the ancestry you resemble (cosmetic).

sheet.description: ASI: +2 any, +1 different any. Ecliptic Surge. Origin Ancestry (cosmetic).

description.p: Once per short rest, after you roll a d20 for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw and determine the result, you can choose to add your proficiency bonus to the roll.
This bonus is added in addition to any proficiency bonus already applied.
You can use this trait after seeing the roll, but before the outcome is resolved.

sheet.description: After you roll a d20 and see the result, you can add your proficiency bonus (before the outcome is resolved).

description.p: If you are Lunar-Touched, choose the ancestry you resemble. This choice is cosmetic.
